Producer: John Cheng, Brad Feinstein, David Henry Gerson, Andrew Levitas, Brett Ratner
Production Co: RatPac-Dune Entertainment, Metalwork Pictures, InterTitle Films
Synopsis: An eccentric and smooth-talking social climber who seems to have everyone in Washington, D.C., wrapped around his finger is investigated after his wealthy, well-connected and much older wife turns up dead in their home.
Title: Georgetown
